thread.title: Marcus Reid
thread.title_full: Bundle Stars reviewed by Marcus Reid

author: Marcus Reid
title: Marcus Reid
text:
Like Humble Bundle and other bundle sites out there, this is a excellent way to pickup games that you might have missed when they where originally released
I think newer gamers will get more value out of the site then old veterans like myself, but even I do occasionally find a game I haven't purchased or something I've let alone for awhile and pickup a bargain,
Well worth visiting and purchasing from :D
